text: Tara ki bale ye, rasula eke racana kareche? Baluna, yadi ami racana kare thaki, tabe tomara allahara sasti theke amake raksa karara adhikari na'o. Tomara e samparke ya alocana kara, se bisaye allaha samyaka abagata. Amara o tomadera madhye tini saksi hisabe yathesta. Tini ksamasila, dayamaya.
